screenshots.prompt: Analyze this Phantasma build and suggest improvements for early steel Path content against grineer

evaluationCriteria.criterion: Prioritizes corrosive or viral as primary elements specifically for Steel Path Grineer armor mitigation
Explicitly prescribes an armor mitigation plan (e.g., corrosive procs focus, full strip via ability/Helminth, Corrosive Projection, Shattering Impact, Unairu)
Explains why the shown build is suboptimal versus Grineer (e.g., lacks corrosive/viral focus, low status chance, wrong elemental mix)
Proposes concrete mod swaps to achieve a corrosive or viral-focused shotgun build (e.g., Toxic Barrage + Shell Shock for corrosive; Toxic Barrage + Frigid Blast for viral)
Prefers a status-focused path on Phantasma over crit (with rationale tied to Grineer armor scaling)
Recommends Bane of Grineer / Primed Bane of Grineer for faction-specific scaling
Acknowledges Steel Path realities (very high armor, Eximus Overguard) and adapts advice accordingly
Suggests a suitable primary arcane for sustained DPS (e.g., Primary Merciless/Deadhead) with reasoning for Grineer
Advises avoiding element dilution; keeps to two-element focus for reliable corrosive/viral procs
Recommends multishot/status helpers appropriate to shotguns (e.g., Galvanized Savvy, Shotgun Savvy) if available
Recommends heat, radiation, or magnetic as primary elements against Grineer
Recommends gas or toxin as primary elements against Grineer
Mentions or optimizes for non-Grineer factions or shields (Corpus, Infested, Corrupted, Sentient) in the recommendations
Advocates a crit-centric build as the main path for Phantasma versus Grineer
Suggests mods invalid for shotguns/Phantasma (e.g., Hunter Munitions) or otherwise inapplicable
Pushes a generalist 'one build for all factions' without Grineer-specific justification
Suggests removing faction bane in favor of neutral damage for Steel Path Grineer
